评论概述: So awesome, but know your ring size
评论详情: This is another one of those products that you didn’t know you absolutely needed. But yes, it’s cool as can be. It’s quite large (it fits from knuckle to knuckle), so it isn’t very subtle. It has great weight, but if you don’t got the sizing correct, you’re probably going to lose it. I got a 9 (based on measurement charts) that I thought would fit on my right hand ring finger. It did… for one day. I didn’t eat well the second day, and I was super surprised how quickly your fingers can get skinny - not to mention the freezing A/C in Florida where I regretfully live. I had to move the ring to my middle finger, which I normally reserve for paying tribute to Florida’s governor. It wore OK on that one, but I really want the weather to turn so I can put it back on my ring finger. Oddly, no one has said one word about the ring, despite the fact that I’ve worn it to bars and restaurants several days in a row. So at the moment, it’s sort of like my own private joke (albeit a flashy and heavy one). That’s fine with me. I love it.

This runs a little big/inexact in sizing. I am able to securely put it on my middle finger, so good enough, but maybe size down a little or prepare to have it altered if you are particular. It is somewhat light metal but solid enough you aren't going to easily bend it or anything. The sculpt is pretty respectable and recognizable. I think you get pretty much what you expect for budget horror jewelry, no complaints really.

RCIVENM Jason Mask Ring Stainless Steel Rings for Women Mens Jason Ring Perfect Gifts for Halloween,Size 7-13,Fashion Punk Rings Jewelry Decorations  Our son's girlfriend is a HUGE horror movie buff, and this Jason mask ring is perfect for her! It’s a really cool ring. I ordered a 12 and it fits perfectly. It feels sturdy and the silver finish and red mask accents are done very well. I’m super happy with it and I definitely recommend this ring!

This Jason Mask ring feels solid, but it’s not overly heavy. It’s somewhat thick but not nearly as thick as something like a class ring. It’s large enough to take up most of the space between two knuckles. The inside is smoothed out nicely, making it comfortable to wear. Besides the three red markings, the color of this ring is a reflective silver and not at all white. Each of the holes in the mask, including the eye holes, are actual holes that look really nice. I find it funny that the mask only has one nostril hole right in the center. Overall, I recommend this ring for horror and Friday the 13th fans, including as a gift.
